title.@value: Contact with health services for routine or ritual circumcision

longDefinition.@value: Circumcision is a surgery that removes the foreskin (the loose tissue) covering glans penis. This surgery may be performed for religious or cultural reasons, or health reasons. Some countries or some families, who practice Judaism or Islam may select to have their sons circumcised as a religious practice or just routinely.

label.@value: Contact with health services for routine or ritual circumcision
